_description: A shoemaker’s verse testament — twelve couplets and burden, ‘Pyrdow pyrdow pyrdowy / Wows se bone Jenket sowterly’

OxfLinLat141.First Lines:
Lystyne lordys veramentHow the sowter hath mad hys
                    testamentwith pyrdow…
OxfLinLat141.Last Lines:
Thus þe sowter mad hys endhe lygge in graff by kyng
                    coltyngWith pyrdowy
OxfLinLat141.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Two Unpublished Fifteenth-Century Poems from Lincoln College, Oxford,
                MS. Lat. 141.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 27 [225] (1980): 20-6: 22.
